Holliday: - Added 6 new heroes to Hero Labs, a new experimental hero matchmaking mode. The heroes are Holliday, Calico, {AbilityIcon|Ability=Wrecker|Size=20} Wrecker, Fathom, Viper and Magician (temp names). The goal of this mode is to invite players to help us in giving hero design feedback while heroes are in very early phases. Most heroes in this mode will have placeholder models, names, effects, etc (some exceptions are older in-dev heroes that had more developed art). They will also sometimes have placeholder/copy-paste abilities for certain slots if that ability slot is still TBD (such as Magician ultimate). There will be a specific hero labs section on the forum to post feedback on these. Heroes in this mode will often be removed, abilities changed, new heroes added, removed heroes re-added, etc. Patch notes for changes to heroes in this mode will be posted on the Hero Labs subforum. This mode will have limited testing hours for now while we gauge activity, in order to ensure faster queue times. You must have at least 50 games played to be able to queue here. If you don't get a new hero selected (since there are less new heroes than there are players), you will be considered higher priority for subsequent matches to get a new hero from your roster selection.

Vindicta: - Added keybinds for "Fly Up" and "Fly Down".  Used for flying abilities like Ivy's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Air Drop|Size=20} Air Drop and Vindicta's Flight
- Gun cycle time improved from 0.26s to 0.22s
- Bullet damage growth per boon increased from 0.55 to 0.65
- Fire rate now scales with Spirit Power (0.14)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20} Assassinate no longer splits to allies
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20} Flight T2 duration increased from +6s to +8s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20} Assassinate bullet radius increased from 3" to 4"
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20} Assassinate scope is now automatically canceled when Paradoxical Swap hits you
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20} Assassinate scope zoom level can now be cycled with right click. Use Ability key to unselect.
Ivy: - Added keybinds for "Fly Up" and "Fly Down".  Used for flying abilities like Ivy's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Air Drop|Size=20} Air Drop and Vindicta's Flight
- Ivy {AbilityIcon|Ability=Kudzu Bomb|Size=20} Kudzu Bomb effects properly display visuals when above ground
- Base bullet damage increased from 4.5 to 5
- Bullet damage growth reduced from 0.39 to 0.36
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Air Drop|Size=20} Air Drop slow reduced from 35% to 30%
Lash: - Fixed jittering from {AbilityIcon|Ability=Lash|Size=20} Lash's gun firing while running and aiming (this should reduce screen noise significantly in this case)
Haze: - Lowered pitch of {AbilityIcon|Ability=Haze|Size=20} Haze voice processing

- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crimson Slash|Size=20} Crimson Slash following in the direction of dash instead of cross hair
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation T1 changed to +20% Fire Rate
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation Cooldown reduced from 106s to 90s
Shiv: - Shiv's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow now stops tracking targets that teleport
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shiv|Size=20} Shiv Dagger: reduced size of stuck dagger in victim
- Shiv {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slice and Dice|Size=20} Slice and Dice: reduced vfx noise for players close to it
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives collision radius reduced by 20%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting T2 cd increased from -4.75s to -25s (final cd changed from 16.25s to 25s)

- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting T1 changed to +8% Incoming Damage Deferred (was +5s duration)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow range reduced from 20m to 13m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow Rage buildup per heavy melee reduced from 3.5 to 2.75
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow Rage buffer duration reduced from 10s to 9s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow Rage buildup vs creeps reduced by 50%
McGinnis: - Gun spin decay rate improved from 0.65 to 0.25
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Mini Turret|Size=20} Mini Turrets cooldown reduced from 24s to 18s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Mini Turret|Size=20} Mini Turrets spirit resist increased from 60% to 80%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Spectral Wall|Size=20} Spectral Wall slow reduced from 25% to 20%

- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Lightning Ball|Size=20} Lightning Ball radius reduced from 4m to 3.5m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Lightning Ball|Size=20} Lightning Ball T2 slow reduced from 40% to 35%
Storm Cloud: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Storm Cloud|Size=20} Storm Cloud expand time reduced from 3s to 2s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Storm Cloud|Size=20} Storm Cloud range increased from 25m to 30m
Serrated Knives: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives collision radius reduced by 20%
Bloodletting: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting T2 cd increased from -4.75s to -25s (final cd changed from 16.25s to 25s)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting Incoming Damage Deferred reduced from 30% to 22%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting T1 changed to +8% Incoming Damage Deferred (was +5s duration)
Assassinate: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20} Assassinate no longer splits to allies
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20} Assassinate bullet radius increased from 3" to 4"
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20} Assassinate scope is now automatically canceled when Paradoxical Swap hits you
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20} Assassinate scope zoom level can now be cycled with right click. Use Ability key to unselect.
Paradoxical Swap: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20} Assassinate scope is now automatically canceled when Paradoxical Swap hits you
The Cube: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=The Cube|Size=20} The Cube T2 moved to T3
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=The Cube|Size=20} The Cube T2 is now +35 HP regen
Splatter: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Splatter|Size=20} Splatter T2 reduced from +60 Damage to +50
Goo Ball: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20} Goo Ball Spirit Resist reduced from 70% to 60%
Alchemical Flask: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask slow duration reduced from 6s to 3s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20} Alchemical Flask weapon damage duration increased from 6s to 7s
Binding Word: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20} Binding Word escape time reduced from 2.9s to 2.8s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20} Binding Word escape range increased from 18.5m to 19m
Last Stand: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Last Stand|Size=20} Last Stand T3 now also grants you unstoppable during the 2s channel
Card Trick: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Card Trick|Size=20} Card Trick base damage reduced from 80 to 70
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Card Trick|Size=20} Card Trick cooldown increased from 0.5s to 0.65s
Telekinesis: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Telekinesis|Size=20} Telekinesis T1 cooldown improved from -28s to -30s
Crimson Slash: - Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crimson Slash|Size=20} Crimson Slash following in the direction of dash instead of cross hair
Shadow Transformation: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation T1 changed to +20% Fire Rate
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation Cooldown reduced from 106s to 90s

General: - Added Commends. You can commend players you've enjoyed playing with during the game or in the post-game scoreboard (same places you would report).  The number of commends you've received on each hero will be displayed in your profile.
- Added new character shader to improve player visibility in all areas of the map and experiment with more stylized rendering of character models
- Updated environment lighting and sky
- Added sequential kill streak music cues
- Fixed being unable to report/mute disconnected players
- You can now drag and drop build categories to move them around

- Added quick-selection for favorite builds. Clicking on the name of your currently active build in the shop will bring up a dropdown that lets you switch between favorited builds for that hero without opening the build browser.
- Added indication of game mode within match history
- Added Rank badge to matches on the Watch page
- Added Rank History tab to profile, currently only visible for yourself. You can click on previous ranks to view the Rank Report summary for that interval
- Flash Windows Taskbar icon if the game window isn't in focus and you have 3 seconds until you respawn
- Fixed issue in several languages where team net worth number shrunk to an unreadable size
- Fixed Urns sometimes appearing to stay in the world after being picked up
- Added Melee Resistance to Vitality stat screen
- Added teleporter channel and appear sounds
- Fixing hitting ESC to close to intro movie also closing the ranked summary popup
- Fixed pregame countdown drawing over the shop UI
- Silenced debuff revisions to reduce obstructed vision of player
- Play a sound when a debuff is applied to player but is purged due to some invulnerability
- Fixed instances where mix ducking occurs too early in a sound event's lifetime
- Fixed audio occlusion filtering artifacts during high rates of change
- Enabled certain music cues like 'respawn' to interrupt base attack music
- Denied orb sound will no longer play beyond 2500 game units from the player
- Increased intelligibility of team-specific hero death sound
- Abandoning Co-op bot matches with more than one party now brings up the Abandon Match confirmation warning instead of leaving immediately
- Bots are better at coming together to defend and push lanes
- Bots will prioritize assisting human allies on offense
- Added a "Mouse Sensitivity: Vertical Scaling" setting
- Added a "Reset Camera" bind (available in Steam Input)
- Fixed Steam Input "Melee" Action not resetting the camera vertically
- Added new Steam Input Analog Action: "Aim". This uses Angle-based sensitivity options in Steam Input (work-in-progress feature).
- Fixed Steam Input aiming no longer being affected by Mouse Sensitivity options (including Invert Y)
- Fixed a bug where the last controller plugged in would block actions from other controllers. Now multiple controllers can be combined.
- AP is no longer granted for Walkers
- Shrine/Patron no longer have Soul/AP bounties
- Shrine Flex Slot moved to "All Shrines"
- Missing AP from above is redistributed along souls reward line at similar soul levels that the objectives previously died on average
- Trooper Soul Orbs now have a 90ms buffer to allow the server to do better calculations on who shot the orb first, to minimize latency advantages for denying
- Trooper soul changed from 50/50% in the kill/orb to 60/40%
- Breakables spawn time increased from 2 minutes to 3 minutes
- Breakables Souls reduced from 35 + 3/min to 30 + 2.5/min
- Urn comeback properties now require an 8% net worth lead to kick in

- Urn pickup locations are the same as before, however now the drop-off locations will be variable based on which team is leading. If there isn't a lead over 8% net worth, then the drop-off location is the same as before. If there is, then the drop-off location will be closer to the losing team's side. The minimap will show where the drop-off location is as usual, as well as an indicator in the world that helps show you where it is.
- If the Urn hasn't been delivered within 90 seconds of pickup time, it now drains your health for 1% of Max HP per second (the timer is per team). Your regen is disabled during this.
- Whenever the Urn is dropped after 90 seconds of pickup time, it starts moving back to its spawn point immediately and cannot be picked up by the same team for 12 seconds.
- Increased speed Urn walks back
- Guardian attack range requirement changed from 20m to requiring you are above the ramp on high ground
- Guardian resist vs troopers changed from starting at 70% and ending at -30% at 10 min to starting at 60% and ending at -35% at 8 minutes
- Guardians now have resist vs players starting at 40% and ending at -35% at 8 minutes
- Walkers now have resist vs troopers starting at 60% and ending at -30% at 14 minutes
- Walkers now have resist vs players starting at 60% and ending at -30% at 14 minutes
- Troopers now gain +40% Spirit Resist gradually over 25 minutes, goes to 70% at 50 minutes

- Backdoor protection detection range for troopers increased (harder to kill troopers approaching the objectives with long range spells to stall making the game think you are backdooring when you aren't)
- Backdoor protection removal now has a 20s buffer (so it doesn't go into protection mode immediately once creeps die)
- Mid Boss respawn timer decreases with subsequent boss kills, from 7 to 7/6/5 minutes
- The 70s respawn time now happens at 30 min instead of 35 min
- There is now a respawn curve that goes from 70s to 75s over 30->40 minutes
- Base Guardians and Shrines no longer have out-of-combat regen
- Parry active window increased from 0.7 to 0.75
- Parry cooldown reduced from 5s to 4.5s
- Medic Trooper heal now has 2 charges; time between casts is 6s [does not consume a charge when healing other troopers, mainly affects waves pushing on their own]
- Medic Trooper heal cooldown increased from 6s to 35s
- Sinner's Sacrifice now shares souls of subsequent hits with everyone that hit it recently (rather than the bigger value from last hit only going to one player)
- Redesigned stairs from central canal to the outer lanes (near Urn spawn)
- Added a skybridge with interior from the Subway Entrance buildings into the Port Authority and Speakeasy buildings
View attachment canal_update_102424.mp4
- Connection hallways behind the Chapel and Firehouse now has an option to continue inside to the Walker arenas
- Neutral camps beside Amber Purple and Sapphire Yellow Walker arenas moved from the ground floor to the upper floor
View attachment purple_update_102424.mp4
- Redesigned traversal from ground floor to upper floor of the Garage and Night Club to get to the Sinner's Sacrifice neutrals
- Replaced fire escape stairs with ropes on the exterior of the Garage and Night Club
View attachment garage_nightclub_102424.mp4
- Added more zipline nodes to outer lanes
